Yeah completely agree, there is typically a gap when Eng manager is not technical enough to understand technical requirements from tech lead which makes it challenging for roadmap planning

but if they are, solid duo! ðŸ”¥

content.html: It's not about the engineering manager not being "technical enough". More often than not, engineering managers were outstanding performing engineers. Your product owner, manager, and tech lead all contribute to the roadmap and the success of hitting milestones.
content.value:
It's not about the engineering manager not being "technical enough". More often than not, engineering managers were outstanding performing engineers. 

Your product owner, manager, and tech lead all contribute to the roadmap and the success of hitting milestones.
